Blight growls at Darkfate as he begins to pulsate violently.

Blight: "IF you so much as look at me wrong from now on, Ill destroy 
you and then your men! And just to show im not bluffing..."

Blight smirks before walking over to a pedestal andthen taps on 
certain areas of the seemingly featureless object. Outside at a 
portion of the large under sea base, two massive doors slide away to 
reveal a large hole in the ground. A moment later a huge claw flys up 
through the water and into the air beofre it latches onto the shuttle 
with Blackknightmare inside. The claw begins to squeeze trapping the 
ship in a deathgrip before it drags it under water.(Yes I got 
permission from yan for the huge claw thing :) ))

Blight: "Have your men arrive here in the next five minutes or else 
that shuttle and all within it shall be melted into a puddle."
